titleStmt.title: The loyal Presbyterian, and the new conformist; with a list of the names of the several ministers, that have taken the oath; and a true copy thereof. Also, the farewell-advice of Mr. Chester, and divers others; and four meditations, for all true believers.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased, stained, print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
